skills.name: Alacrity
skills.description: Applies a clearcast boon. The next cast will be instant with no mana, health or stamina cost.

ranks.description: Applies a clearcast boon. The next cast will be instant with no mana, health or stamina cost.

skills.name: Inner_Focus
skills.description: Provides a buff that guarantees a 100% Critical Strike chance for the next attack.

ranks.description: Provides a buff that guarantees a 100% Critical Strike chance for the next attack.

skills.name: Leg_Up
skills.description: Grants a movement speed increase buff, additionally increasing evasion.

ranks.description: Grants a movement speed increase buff, additionally increasing evasion.

skills.name: Recall
skills.description: Recalls the player back to Sanctum, spawning a portal to return where the caster recalled from. Can only cast outside of Sanctum.

ranks.description: Recalls the player back to Sanctum, spawning a portal to return where the caster recalled from. Can only cast outside of Sanctum.

skills.name: Recovery
skills.description: Applies a healing condition that restores health over time.

ranks.description: Applies a healing condition that restores health over time.

skills.name: Rock_Toss
skills.description: Tosses a rock, dealing $DMG damage and generating high threat.

ranks.description: Tosses a rock, dealing $DMG damage and generating high threat.

skills.name: Siphon_Leech
skills.description: Shoots a siphoning projectile that spawns eldritch leeches on the hit target, healing the caster as they deal damage.

ranks.description: Shoots a siphoning projectile that spawns eldritch leeches on the hit target, healing the caster as they deal damage.

skills.name: Sturdy
skills.description: Provides a boon condition that grants immunity to knockback and auto parries incoming attacks.

ranks.description: Provides a boon condition that grants immunity to knockback and auto parries incoming attacks.

skills.name: Dexterity_Mastery
skills.description:
Enhances charge and jump attacking with dexterity weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 18% damage bonus towards dexterity weapons.

ranks.description:
Enhances charge and jump attacking with dexterity weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 18% damage bonus towards dexterity weapons.

skills.name: Mind_Mastery
skills.description:
Enhances charge attacking with mind weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 12% damage bonus towards mind weapons.

ranks.description:
Enhances charge attacking with mind weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 12% damage bonus towards mind weapons.

skills.name: Strength_Mastery
skills.description:
Enhances charge and jump attacking with strength weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 16% damage bonus towards strength weapons.

ranks.description:
Enhances charge and jump attacking with strength weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons.

Additionally adds a 16% damage bonus towards strength weapons.

skills.name: Multi_Bash
skills.description: Multihits adjacent targets, dealing constant $DMG damage using maximum weapon damage combined with skill power.

ranks.description: Multihits adjacent targets, dealing constant $DMG damage using maximum weapon damage combined with skill power.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: Taunts surrounding targets, applying maximum threat to them, and decreases their defense stat.

ranks.description: Taunts surrounding targets, applying maximum threat to them, and decreases their defense stat.

skills.name: Spread_Shot
skills.description:
Fires a spread of projectiles, dealing 
$DMG damage twice.

ranks.description:
Fires a spread of projectiles, dealing 
$DMG damage twice.

skills.name: Focus_Shot
skills.description: Fires a focused piercing shot that goes through targets, using maximum weapon damage combined with skill power. Deals $DMG damage.

ranks.description: Fires a focused piercing shot that goes through targets, using maximum weapon damage combined with skill power. Deals $DMG damage.

skills.name: Fira
skills.description: Casts three bolts of fire at once that deals $DMG fire damage. The first two bolts fire forward, while the third bolt circles around the caster.

ranks.description: Casts three bolts of fire at once that deals $DMG fire damage. The first two bolts fire forward, while the third bolt circles around the caster.

skills.name: Crya
skills.description: Casts multiple ice needles, each causing $DMG water damage. Causes a snare condition.

ranks.description: Casts multiple ice needles, each causing $DMG water damage. Causes a snare condition.

skills.name: Spire
skills.description: Molds the surface into a row of nine spires, dealing $DMG earth damage each. Can cause a bleeding condition on hit.

ranks.description: Molds the surface into a row of nine spires, dealing $DMG earth damage each. Can cause a bleeding condition on hit.

skills.name: Aquos
skills.description: Casts a torrent of freezing water in front of the caster, dealing $DMG water damage.

ranks.description: Casts a torrent of freezing water in front of the caster, dealing $DMG water damage.

skills.name: Gust
skills.description: Sends off a glyph of wind magic in front of the caster, greatly knocking back targets when hit. Deals $DMG nature damage.

ranks.description: Sends off a glyph of wind magic in front of the caster, greatly knocking back targets when hit. Deals $DMG nature damage.

skills.name: Talus
skills.description: Summons a massive boulder, smashing it into the ground, causing knockback. Deals $DMG earth damage.

ranks.description: Summons a massive boulder, smashing it into the ground, causing knockback. Deals $DMG earth damage.

skills.name: Curis
skills.description: Instantly heals the caster and nearby allies by $DMG.

ranks.description: Instantly heals the caster and nearby allies by $DMG.

skills.name: Life_Tap
skills.description: Fully replenishes the casters mana at the cost of 40% of their maximum health.

ranks.description: Fully replenishes the casters mana at the cost of 40% of their maximum health.
